Texts.Chs: 快做一个^orange;基础巢框^reset;，因为没有它，蜜蜂没有落脚的地方。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Basic Frame^reset; is placed within an apiary to act as housing for the bees. Create one now.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;巢框^reset;分有许多种，你应该针对不同的蜜蜂使用不同的巢框，这就需要你细细思考了。
Texts.Eng: There are ^orange;many types of frames^reset;, and different bees will prefer certain types. You'll need to be creative.
